description: Dashboard to visualize data from the NVIDIA Data Center GPU Manager (DCGM).

panels.description: Host load averages indicate system processing demand over 1, 5, and 15-minute intervals. Values reflect the number of processes waiting for resources.
panels.title: Host Load

panels.description: Tracks real-time power consumption of each GPU in watts.
panels.title: GPU Power Usage

panels.description: Displays the combined power consumption of all GPUs in the system, measured in watts.
panels.title: GPU Total Power

panels.description: The ratio of cycles an SM has at least 1 warp assigned.
panels.title: SM Active

panels.description: Shows physical memory consumption, calculated as (Total Memory - Free Memory - Buffers - Cached).
panels.title: System Memory Usage

panels.description: Monitors the core temperature of each GPU in degrees Celsius.
panels.title: GPU Temperature

panels.description: Displays the average temperature across all GPUs in the system.
panels.title: GPU Avg. Temperature

panels.description: Ratio of cycles the tensor (HMMA) pipe is active.
panels.title: Tensor Core Utilization

panels.description: Shows total disk consumption as a percentage of total capacity.
panels.title: Disk Usage

panels.description: Displays the percentage of system RAM actively in use, excluding cache and buffers.
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Tracks the percentage of time the GPU is actively processing workloads.
panels.title: GPU Utilization

panels.description: Displays the utilization across all GPUs in the system.
panels.title: GPU Total Utilization

panels.description: Ratio of cycles the fp64 pipes are active.
panels.title: FP64 Active

panels.description: The rate of data transmitted and received over the PCIe bus in bytes per second.
panels.title: PCIe Throughput

panels.description: Measures the percentage of time the GPU's copy engines are actively transferring data between host and device memory.
panels.title: GPU Memory Copy Utilization

panels.description: Displays the average utilization of GPU memory copy engines across all GPUs, showing the percentage of time spent transferring data between host and device memory.
panels.title: GPU Total Memory Copy Utilization

panels.description: Ratio of cycles the fp32 pipes are active.
panels.title: FP32 Active

panels.description: Displays the full system identifier.
panels.title: Compute instance name

panels.description: Displays the Linux kernel version running on the host system.
panels.title: Kernel

panels.description: Displays the percentage of GPU memory currently allocated, calculated as used memory divided by total available memory.
panels.title: GPU Memory Usage

panels.description: Displays the average power consumption of GPUs in watts.
panels.title: GPU Power Draw

panels.description: Ratio of cycles the fp16 pipes are active.
panels.title: FP16 Active

panels.description: Displays the current Streaming Multiprocessor (SM) clock frequency in MHz.
panels.title: GPU SM Clocks

panels.description: Displays the current memory clock frequency of the GPU in GHz.
panels.title: GPU Memory Clocks

title: Nebius GPU
